name: Stillness of Snow (Limited Edition Print)
description: A delicately printed cyanotype photograph: ‘Stillness of Snow’ depicts a snow covered forest, still and peaceful. Cyanotype is an early alternative photography technique from the 1840s. The rich indigo blue colour is created by the process, and gives the images a lovely ethereal quality. This edition is of 30 x A5 or 30x40 prints, all numbered, signed and dated. Each cyanotype is created by hand, so there will be slight variances to the image shown. The print will be posted to you flat, wrapped in tissue and ribbon and carefully packaged so it arrives safe and sound. What it’s made from Each print is hand-crafted using the original cyanotype technique, painting archival watercolour paper with a solution to make it light sensitive, and exposing the image onto the paper. Size A5 Mounted Print Size: The outside edges of the mount are approx. 24 x 18cm (will fit in standard frame) Image size: approx. 15 x 9cm £22.00 & £1.75 postage 30 x 40 Mounted Print Size: The outside edges of the mount are approx. 30 x 40cm (will fit in standard frame) Image size: approx. 26 x 17cm £39.00 & £1.75 postage

name: Pack of Christmas Cards
description:
A pack of 4 original artwork greetings cards, with a mounted cyanotype print on the front and blank inside for your own message.

Each one is made from quality recycled ivory card (250gsm thick), measures 14.7 x 10.4cm, and comes with a cream envelope, protected in a sleeve. Each card is initialled.

Cards shown in first image are (left to right): 
All Gone
Waiting
Winter Solitude

Second image: Trench Wood
Third image: All Gone

Why not treat yourself to this pack of four cards to send to friends & family or keep for your own display! One of each card will be provided unless otherwise requested.

Also available as individual cards (£3.60 each)

Postage is £0.95, or free with any other item.

name: Little Ferns Pin Brooch
description:
This lovely little pin brooch is created from an original cyanotype print on thick watercolour paper. 

Capturing the silhouettes of lots of lovely little ferns, this brooch will look great on jackets, jumpers and scarves, and is an ideal stocking filler for Christmas.

Each brooch is 25mm in diameter, with a fully metal exterior and pin, and comes in its own cellophane packet.

Printed on thick watercolour paper, it can withstand most of the British Weather, having been thoroughly tested in West Yorkshire! We recommend not wearing outdoors in heavy rain.

There are three other pin brooch designs available; single fern, stone angel and cow parsley.

Delivery £0.95 or free with any other item.
